name: MYC_PT_ISSUE
description: When a patient enters new data in the Health Issues section of Your Health Record in the web-based chart system, a new record is created in this table. NOTE: this is patient-entered data and is not part of the patient's official medical record.

columns.name: INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the "Your Health Record" health issue record.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the web-based chart system account that is associated with the "Your Health Record" health issue record.

columns.name: ISSUE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Health Issue, as entered by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: DATE_NOTED
columns.description: The date the health issue was diagnosed, as entered by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: ISSUE_COMMENT
columns.description: Any text entered into the health issue comments field by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time that this record was pulled into enterprise reporting

columns.name: ISSUE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The health issue status category number for the "Your Health Record" health issue record.
